## Bio:

My name is Dharnish Muralidharan, and I am a junior at The University of Texas at Austin majoring in Statistics and Data Science. I enjoy exploring how data can be transformed into meaningful insights and applied to solve real-world problems. I am a hardworking and dedicated student who thrives on challenges and continuous learning. Looking ahead, I aspire to begin my career as a Machine Learning Engineer, where I can apply my skills in data analysis, programming, and model building to develop innovative solutions that make a positive impact.
